website_summaries.verdict: At $400, the OnePlus 3 is the best budget Android phone you can buy, with a premium look and feel, and performance fast enough to go head-to-head with any high-end handset on the market.
pros: The OnePlus 3's sharp camera, powerful processor and enduring, quick-charging battery make a knockout combo when you factor in its low price
cons: The camera has a distinct bulge
Power users may be disappointed that the phone doesn't have a swappable battery or expandable storage

customer_reviews.title: steer clear
customer_reviews.text: Don't fall for this crap, the phone is listed as US version, I was not able to get 4G LTE in it, the best I got was 3G. After I chat with OnePlus support,they informed me that the phone that I have is Chinese version and it doesn't support the NA bands. I tried different sim cards and different carriers. I spent hours trying to figure out a way to unlock the 4G LTE band, to no available. Speed test is attached
customer_reviews.author: Samadi

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone!
customer_reviews.text: Why waste your time and buy phones that are locked through US Carriers. Why waste money and buy phone just for the brand name when there is another that can deliver the same performance, reliability and at times even better. Why waste time and money buying a phone full of bloatware from the carriers. I bought this one and later upgraded to the older brother OnePlus 6. The OnePlus line is solid, great performance, that Dual sim is great for international travelers and even if you refuse to be tied to one provider. I would recommend this phone again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Elvin Charleston

customer_reviews.title: The best $100 phone on the Market.
customer_reviews.text: The oneplus3 is an excellent phone if you can find it within the $100 range for a used or renewed OnePlus 3 for multiple reasons 1. The ram it is 6gb of ram verse against new phones even til this very day is only 4gb like the Samsung Galaxy S7, s8 or LG 5, LG 6 and LG G7. 2. Always has the latest Android while Samsung Galaxy updates are slow . 3 I love the metal body feel and is an improvement compared to new phones who use glass and steel which cracks easily.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Varde

customer_reviews.title: Best for the price
customer_reviews.text: Best cellphone for the price. After a lot of time investigating and comparing, I've decided that the OP 3 was the phone for me, and I'm really happy that I chose it. After almost 3 months of use, it still works as new, has no problems running any app, and it's updated to Oreo. The alert slider is really useful. Things I liked the most: - Physical capacitive buttons for back, recents and home (this was really important to me, as I don't like these buttons using screen space) - Volume slider, really useful - 64GB of internal storage, being used to 8GB on a 2nd generation Moto G - The camera
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone overall
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent phone, my only hang-up is that the volume button is on the small side and sometimes I turn the volume the opposite of what I intended to since the +/- both get pushed at the same time. Also there were some shipping problems, but that's more a reflection of Amazon and FedEx, not the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not working with GoogleFi
customer_reviews.text: Like all the phone features, esp. camera. Phone network is working fine with ATT. but when i try to migrate to GoogleFi, phone seem to be incompatible. Fi says its very much compatible with oneplus 3, but when i try to do the actual use, it fails.
customer_reviews.author: Hari Baskar

customer_reviews.title: Kinda sad that the 4g won't work considering the reduced amount ...
customer_reviews.text: Kinda sad that the 4g won't work considering the reduced amount of bands my country has. The phone is excellent nonetheless ♥
customer_reviews.author: Laura P.

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable, poor support
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Aaaaaaaaaaand mere days after I posted this review, OP sent an update that bricked the phone. No bootloader, no OS, no buzz after holding power button down for hard reset. Level 2 tech support at Oneplus hasn't helped, and they won't honor warranty unless you bought from the manufacturer's website. I've contacted the seller and amazon, and will update when I hear more. 3 months is not a reasonable working life for a phone. Great screen, very fast. No need to spend 800 dollars on a brand new flagship phone.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Higgins

customer_reviews.text: I think I have officially switched to OnePlus. This phone has been a true life changer! The battery life and storage show me to do so much more in a day! I can be productive or just chill and watch a movie. The phone is comfortable and easy to use. I've had it for some time now and still make people use it to feel the freedom I feel.
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: The phone doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: It has only been 11 months and the mother board is gone hardly ever use the phone to do any hard core stuff just the basic and it is not working battery memory camera every thing else was fine except it started the black screen with in 6 months of using it and then it just blanked out in april worst buy ever especially knowing it was just a few months
customer_reviews.author: Casandra Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Not a good phone at all from this seller
customer_reviews.text: The phone they gave had Hydrogen OS (only used in China) instead of Oxygen OS, so had to root the phone. Then, had issues with the network reception, the phone does not catch the network most of the times. The shortcuts gets enabled automatically, the gesture navigation does not work. The battery drains fast even with light to medium use per day. Not a good phone from this seller at all.
customer_reviews.author: A.D.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and value. One of the best cellphones I have owned ever.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Lairet

customer_reviews.title: Freezing Issues
customer_reviews.text: Right when I received my phone, I was having a freezing issue where the screen was not reacting to touch unless I turned it off twice in a row. This problem continued even after factory resetting a few times. I tried everything I could think of to fix it, but the problems are still there, and I most likely need to buy a new phone after having this one less than 8 months. I was so excited for the product too.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C.

customer_reviews.title: Good at smacking people
customer_reviews.text: At my school too many people piss me off, and a good way to stop them is to smack them with this phone, overall ten out of ten much good very wow
customer_reviews.author: William ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Best ROI phone
customer_reviews.text: One of the best phone I've ever had comparing to Samsung and Apple smartphones. Sure, it has its flaws but all in all the phones Mechanic, camera and cpu is top notch for its price
customer_reviews.author: Rotem

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Best phone on the market in my opinion. It allows custom roms and whathaveyou, as well as having good hardware and great charging speeds.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley G.

customer_reviews.title: Flag ship killer for sure
customer_reviews.text: Great phone can do everything any brand name phone can. It has really cool gestures that phones twice as much don't even have. I thought about getting the 3T but I'm so glad I didn't when I got this phone and realized how great it is.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Warranty a scam!
customer_reviews.text: Neither Tech International nor OnePlus will honor the 1-year manufacturer warranty that's listed. Super frustrating. Phone stopped working within a year.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: I like the big powerful phone that it is but I'm a little disappointed in a few little bugs that I've already experienced. The main one is opening up a text from the lock screen, sometimes it'll take a while to open up.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Koehn

customer_reviews.title: A high end phone at a moderate price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. The battery on my One Plus one was starting to go out so I purchased the One Plus Three. Very happy with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Dosh13

customer_reviews.title: PRICE!!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, does everything that the others do - great battery life! Super fast charge time also. Great camera 16meg rear, 8meg front facing 64GB memory
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: I'm ​very pleased with the phones quality and performance
customer_reviews.text: I was a little leary about buying a phone that I'd never heard of but I didn't want to spend $800 - 1000. I'm ​very pleased with the phones quality and performance. I'm glad I went with it
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The phone suddenly died after 6 weeks with no warning.

customer_reviews.title: Truly a Flagship Killer...
customer_reviews.text: Was split between this and the Axon 7 for a while but found the One Plus 3 at a cheaper price and absolutely love this phone everyone is spot on when they say Flagship killer this phone truly is amazing and may as well be a Flagship itself...
customer_reviews.author: AtomicWarfare18

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone for those looking for a flagship without breaking ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone for those looking for a flagship without breaking the bank. Be careful to mind the LTE bands, since they aren't clearly listed anywhere on the publication.

customer_reviews.title: all the bells and whistles without the $ tag
customer_reviews.text: It's all good. Fast Charging, Fast Streaming, price is right

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone
customer_reviews.text: Great flagship killer for 400 dollars, i have not had any problems with it and I love it, so much you can do with it and it beats buying a iPhone or a Samsung

customer_reviews.title: MAKE SURE YOUR CARRIER SUPPORTS THIS PHONE
customer_reviews.text: Great phone here definitely 5 stars but make sure the phone supports your carriers Internet bands or else you will get 3/4g Internet instead of LTE.. Otherwise a great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Melquoin gray

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 excellent phone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone, it's overpriced but still cheaper than the price that it's sell in my country
customer_reviews.author: Franco Zúñiga

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: I have to say in love with it no complaints here it's been a week and so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Unlocked phones are great.
customer_reviews.text: Makes my experience with the smartphones much more enjoyable. Unlocked phones are great.
customer_reviews.author: Kinney I.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best phones that I already had
customer_reviews.text: One of the best phones that I already had, great phone for a fair price.. I highly recommend for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Thales P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cell phone is awesome!!! Best one I ever had so far!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was perfect. Phone is in very good condition. New. And it works as expected. Will definitely recommend to buy. Good phone for its cost. Idk why people put negative reviews because it doesn't suit them. Come on you can't exoect this phone to be like some phone you have had before. If that's what you want, buy the other phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana S.

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I've ever had. I've owned various Samsung phones, HTC, nokia, LG, and iPhones. This is the best. Powerful, doesn't slow down, simple, sleek... It's perfect. I've gotten one for my wife and my mother now too. For the price and quality I can't believe this brand of phones isn't more popular! I guess marketing is everything.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect design, nice performance, great hardware, simply the best smartphone
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Leon

customer_reviews.title: Help me
customer_reviews.text: The cell phone came with broken glass. It works correctly but the glass must be cmabiarlo because it does not look good? Where can I do it?

customer_reviews.title: Forgets WiFi after reboot.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is fine except for one thing. That is, after a reboot this phone seems to forget the Wifi networks it was connected to previously. So after a reboot I have to enter the wifi password. Kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Nitesh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best phone ever. Worth every penny. Ordered two but only one arrived however amazon made it right.

customer_reviews.title: All around great phone
customer_reviews.text: Worked pretty good but Wi-Fi calling and camera. Need more work.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just got it, and am hoping to enjoying the new phone, it came real quick too.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone.
customer_reviews.text: Oneplus 3 is awesome. Worth the delay in shipping due to loss of item by shipping agent. Seller did a great job to follow up lost item and express ship it. Thanks.

customer_reviews.title: Product description was wrong
customer_reviews.text: Received different product version. Product description was wrong. Description said version was A3003, received version is A3000
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My phone died after 4 months of use. Out ...
customer_reviews.text: My phone died after 4 months of use. Out of the sudden, with battery charged to a 30% while I was texting. It just turned off and never was able to turn it on again. Not by charging, factory reset, battery reset (all these by pressing key combinations)
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: I feel very disappointed and angry
customer_reviews.text: I feel cheated. They announce the international version A3005 and I am sold the Chinese version A3000. I feel very disappointed and angry. The worst thing is that they wash their hands arguing that it has no guarantee. Please do not buy this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Andres R.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The phone came with a screen problem (yellow strip from top to bottom). Lucky me.
customer_reviews.author: Ygor Oliveira de Carvalho

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Got two broken iPod and a bag of pennies
customer_reviews.author: Edgy person

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this phone in the US  unless you are 100% sure it will work with your carrier
customer_reviews.text: Be very careful purchasing this in the US. It states this is compatible with ATT and Sprint. However, it DOES NOT connect to AT&T's LTE network. If you are an AT&T customer, you will be buying a very expensive 3G phone. I thought this was an AT&T problem and worked with them. Then I went to OnePlus and they told me I had purchased a phone built for the Chinese market. Understood it was an International phone, but the details in the description indicating this would work with AT&T were misleading. This should not be sold to US customers without some very specific details on how to verify it will work with your carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Rames

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this phone after my LG 4 died. Customer service assisted me and I returned the LG and ordered the One PLus 3. It arrived in perfect condition.So far love this phone. I use cricket, I put in the sim card and didn't need to add anything to get it working. Customer service said for this seller was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Turns out it WASN'T the USA Version and is missing TMobile Bands AVOID mercate group
customer_reviews.text: I bought the "OnePlus 3 A3000 64GB Graphite, 5.5", Dual Sim, GSM Factory Unlocked U.S.A Version" as gift for one of the kids. Turns out it's NOT the USA version as advertised, but some alternate version which doesn't support TMobile LTE bands. Just switched from AT&T and now it only gets 2G on TMobile. Of course, since we didn't discover it right away (a year has past) there's not much I can do except write a scathing review...BEWARE buying old OnePlus 3 Devices...there are some overseas models which basically don't work.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Be warned everyone. These are the Asian variants. They do not work with USA 4g/lte
customer_reviews.author: R. G.

customer_reviews.title: Very good phone. Excellent features
customer_reviews.text: Came as expected. I got this for my mother. She loves it. Works well in Barbados. Very good phone. Excellent features.
customer_reviews.author: devinda

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware - good technology - horrible product description
customer_reviews.text: This phone is NOT fully compatible with AT&T. It does NOT support LTE (you'll get H+ instead ((basically 3G))). This phone did NOT come with earphones. The two things that kept this from being one star is Amazon Support & OnePlus hardware. The failures listed above land squarely on the seller. I'm getting a refund and I'll be more careful next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stay AWAY from Oneplus
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE! Do yourself a favor and pay extra for a better brand and a better phone. The phone completely stopped working after 2 months. Customer support (Which barely spoke English) suggested I let it power cycle for 18 hours...... If someone had told me you have to let this phone "Rest" every few days, I would have never bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenz S

customer_reviews.title: One plus 3
customer_reviews.text: One the best phone of it era. I received what advertised by the seller. I highly recommend that seller.
customer_reviews.author: Franck

customer_reviews.title: Buy the 3T.
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't you say that the international version is 3g only? It was always hunting for signal. Sent back. However, it is an awesome piece of hardware. Do yourself a favor and buy the 3T
customer_reviews.author: Jason T.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: amazing product excecellent workmanship .... not like the cheaper items sold .... great price

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty good, great performance. The button to change it from ring/vibrate mode gets a little stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Hurtado

customer_reviews.title: Good camera.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for about 3 months now. No complains. It's high quality device. Doesn't slow down when multiple apps are open. Good camera.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir Nemirovsky

customer_reviews.title: If you're going to go with android, I wouldn't consider anything but the OnePlus 3
customer_reviews.text: bought this phone as a secondary phone, I actually hate android, but didn't want to have two phones on the same systems, I thought it would be good to try something new. This phone is one of the only android phones I would ever consider since it runs stock android, bootloader is unlocked, and phone quality is great (unlike the crap Samsung and the rest of the companies build). Got this phone as an open boxed item, saved nearly $80 from the original price, but the phone was in MINT BRAND NEW condition. What a steal of a deal. As usual, android has random bugs causing for glitches (which I experienced in the first 2 days), but there's work arounds...
customer_reviews.author: Jasdeep C.

customer_reviews.title: excellent performance, pure sound
customer_reviews.text: supper, excellent performance, pure sound, pure shots,and fast charger, but if and only if it comes with 4000 mAH battery!

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This phone is simple fire 🔥. Great product for a great price. More than bang for your buck!! 👍
customer_reviews.author: Kadman

customer_reviews.title: As per features good mobile but 4g let is not working in US ...
customer_reviews.text: As per features good mobile but 4g let is not working in US in most of the places. First I thought it's network issue but when I switched sim to other mobile then found out that it's mobile.
customer_reviews.author: nava58

customer_reviews.title: I love it. No issues/problem at all
customer_reviews.text: Just started using this phone. Right now, I love it. No issues/problem at all. Screen is clear and pictures are great!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Diane

customer_reviews.title: Defective in US
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't get 4G in America... I had 4g lte in Japan and Thailand. I'm returning the phone as soon as I get home to America. Thank goodness it worked abroad... I will say that my roommate has this phone and doesn't have this issue... But F this noise. I'm glad I'm getting a refund. If this phone got 4glte in the US, I would have given it 5 stars. the display, the camera, the storage space, 6gigs of ram and more are all incredible with this phone...
customer_reviews.author: Redsnakeking

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a great phone, no complaints. Just hard to get parts for or repair if it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Sally117

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, no problems, extreme upgrade from my old phone love it.

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone!
customer_reviews.text: great phone! using it side by side with iPhone6SPlus (I want 2nd phone for camera operation (CamFi) en DJI Phantom screen (til iPad mini 5 arrives) and as satnav in car (I don't want my primary (i)Phone in cradles anymore :-) ) and it delivers great performance - great build quality and look and feel and performance - great deal with NGP Store USA!
customer_reviews.author: H. J. F. Kleijssen

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good phone by any standard
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good phone by any standard. Though the battery seems over rated but I realize it might be because I am in tropic region. It does heat up easily when downloading or charging and using the phone. I found most features as described by manufacturer. For the price, I cannot complain much, it takes a lot of getting used to as well

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, a really good deal for all the specs. So far, great!

customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt, The best Cell phone I have ever had. fast, strong, comfortable to use.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and functions very well.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, protects camera lens, does not make the phone look too far off the original look, lip around screen means that is also protected from scratches. Nicely made, no made in China chemical smell as many of these sort of products have these days. Very happy and would buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone . its amazing, and the supplier was very professional in every manner from purchase to delivery.

customer_reviews.text: Came just in time. And its just like the previews on youtube. Yes it is wayy fast. Lol

product_meta.title: OnePlus 3 A3000 64GB Graphite, 5.5", Dual Sim, GSM Factory Unlocked U.S.A Version
product_meta.description:
16MP Primary Camera with PDAF, EIS and optical (OIS) stabilization technologies protected by a more durable sapphire glass with a 16 MP front Camera
13.97 centimeters (5.5-inch) optic AMOLED full HD Capacitive touchscreen with 1920 x 1080 pixels resolution and 401 ppi pixel density
Android OS V6.0.1 upgradable to V7.1.1 nougat. Qualcomm Snapdragon 821 MSM8996 Pro Quad core processor; Adreno 530 GPU 6GB LPDDR4 RAM, 64GB memory (ufs 2.0), Dual Nano-sim dual-standby (4g+4g)
3, 400 mAh Lithium-Polymer battery (non-removable) powered by state-of-the-art dash charge (5V 4a) technology; NFC enabled, Bluetooth 4.2and reversible Type-C connector
1 year manufacturer warranty for Device
feature_bullets: OS OxygenOS based on Android Nougat, RAM - 6GB LPDDR4, Storage - 64GB, CPU:- Qualcomm Snapdragon 820, Display 5.5" 1080p Full HD (1920 x 1080 pixels)
PortsUSB 2.0, Type-C Dual nano-SIM slot 3.5 mm audio jack, Battery 3400 mAh, Dash Charge (5V, 4A)
Rear Camera:- 16 MP Sensor Sony IMX 298, Front Camera:- 8 MP Sensor Sony IMX179

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars200 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
